root.name: Crusaders of Might and Magic
root.description: Overview Crusaders of Might and Magic was developed and published by 3D0 for the PC in 1999 and later for the PlayStation in 2000. In Crusaders of Might and Magic you take on the role of Drake and are set in a fantasy world in which the main conflict revolves around an undead army, the Legion of the Fallen, and the sky-dwellers the crusaders.
